text: Detlef Schrempf (born January 21, 1963) is a German retired professional basketball player from West Germany. He played 16 seasons in the National Basketball Association (NBA). He played for the Dallas Mavericks, Indiana Pacers, Seattle SuperSonics, and Portland Trail Blazers. He was put in the FIBA Hall of Fame in 2021. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:1984 Summer Olympics Category:1992 Summer Olympics Category:Dallas Mavericks players Category:Indiana Pacers players Category:People from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Portland Trail Blazers players Category:Seattle SuperSonics players
title: Detlef Schrempf
